original_title: The Marcus King Band Performs El Dorado
overview: Marcus King is widely considered one of the most soulful voices of his generation. And then there’s his blistering guitar playing, a unique blend of R&B, country, soul and rock. The 25-year-old Grammy-nominated phenom recently concluded four special shows in Nashville. Now, they’re coming to The Coda Collection! The first concert of his “Four of a Kind” series features incendiary performances of material from his acclaimed “El Dorado” album — and it’s streaming now. Don’t miss exclusive clips, interviews and insights below. Then check back for more special content as additional shows launch exclusively on The Coda Collection.
title: The Marcus King Band Performs El Dorado
